body:
Lots of the posts I sent here were due to a project I was working on
about Hagia Sophia in Istanbul. We used a bunch of modeling apps,
radiance for the daylight and material simulation, and, to mention here,
made heavy use of Schorsch Mischler's dxf2rad. So to give an idea, one
of the images that have been generated from the highly detailed model:

http://www.archipelagus.de/lenya/archipelagus.de/live/projekte/rekonstruktionen-index/HagiaSophia-index/Kollonaden-Bild-mittel.html

Sorry for that URL... ;-)

Lars.
